entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
